metadata.title: CVE-2024-36053 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the mintupload package through 4.2.0 for Linux Mint, service-namemishandling leads to command injection via shell metacharacters incheck_connection, drop_data_received_cb, and Service.remove. A user canmodify a service name in a ~/.linuxmint/mintUpload/services/service file.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
